repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
Fix #30601


```
~$ curl --head localhost:3000/robots.txt
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Cache-Control: max-age=0, private, must-revalidate
Content-Length: 5
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Last-Modified: Wed, 19 Jul 2023 04:56:12 GMT
X-Gitea-Debug: RUN_MODE=dev
Date: Fri, 19 Apr 2024 12:59:44 GMT
```
